name: 1HGJ5: Spaceship Prototype
description:
My entry for the 1 Hour Gamejam 5. Some experiments with physics based ship movement in space and mouse tracking camera. There's not much to do other than manoeuvre around. The ship uses physics like in space so you'll continue forward using momentum unless you thrust in the opposite direction,

Controls:

  • Move mouse to turn ship.
  • Left mouse button to thrust.
  • Q to quit.
